bullets: Developed and fine-tuned ML models using Python, TensorFlow, and scikit-learn on real datasets.
Improved model accuracy by 15% through feature engineering and hyperparameter tuning.
Implemented generative AI prototypes and deployed models with best practices.
Developed a comprehensive inventory management system using MERN stack (React, Node.js, MongoDB).
Implemented role-based access control and admin dashboard for business operations.
Integrated real-time inventory tracking and reporting features.
Deployed the application with proper security measures and database optimization.
Designed and implemented microservices architecture using Spring Boot and Java.
Managed multiple microservices with proper API gateway and service discovery.
Implemented database design and optimization for scalable applications.
Used Docker for containerization and deployment automation.
